Every government did the same mistake : taking the number of today to say “Look, it’s not even 1% of the flu numbers”.

Of course ! But the trend is here, and it’s already very hard to invert it.

Every government did the same mistake : taking the number of today to say “Look, it’s not even 1% of the flu numbers”.

But they are acting like tomorrow does not exist.

And in that case, it’s easy to know what the future will be: without measures, next week it will be 9x worse. And the next, 9x more. (and just slightly less for the US right now, if numbers of fatality are correct, but still exponential, and faster to spread than most diseases).

We are thinking and forecasting creatures, or we pride ourselves to be.

Let’s use our brains, and see what is obviously in front of us.

By François Lagunas on March 11, 2020.
